title: Homeopathy & aromatherapy
description: Hersteller und Systemlieferant für Schraubverschlüsse und Dosiersysteme aus Kunststoff, Elastomer und Glas. Kindersichere und seniorenfreundliche Lösungen zum Verschließen von Flaschen und zum Dosieren von Flüssigkeiten.
cleaned_text: Closure systems and dosing systems for homeopathy & aromatherapy Essential oils and essences have very special requirements for primary packaging. Therefore, we have developed special closures and dosing systems for the application areas of homeopathy and aromatherapy thanks to our many years of experience. These are not only functional, but also visually appealing to customers. We provide a wide variety of attractive closure shapes, external shapes and colours that match your selected bottle shapes and labels to distinguish brands and products. This actively helps consumers quickly pick the right product from your range. All Sensoplast closure systems can, of course, be embellished with your individual brand, company logo or other embellishments.
